title: 02/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses a report regarding Jimmy Garroppolo's future with the 49ers and why it doesn't make sense for San Francisco to try and trade their franchise quarterback. He also argues the Boston Celtics have missed their championship opportunity by being too cautious and not making a big move to acquire another super star. Plus, World Series Champion Justin Turner joins the show to talk about his decision to re-sign with the Dodgers and what it is like to play alongside Mookie Betts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
